arts.ttl: Cardiff City 3-0 Rotherham United: A dominant display sees Cardiff continue unbeaten start
arts.sum: Salech finally broke the deadlock with a header just before half-time before Ashford’s superb strike and Colwill’s close-range finish sealed the win after the interval. For Rotherham, it was another disappointing afternoon in South Wales as they failed to muster any sustained threat and saw their 27-year wait for a win away to Cardiff extended.

arts.ttl: Cardiff vs Rotherham - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Cardiff City and Rotherham United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
